nodes.message: Give a present to Joel for rep

nodes.text: Would you like an apple?
No, thank you, I might get apple juice on my jacket.
Would you like an apple tart?
No, thank you. I consider it to be unhealthy to eat food away from the dinner table.
It is difficult to crawl through windows or hide in shadows when one's belly protrudes.
Would you like a bottle of this fine wine I came across?
You are giving this to me? That is most kind of you. I will enjoy this.
I found this bottle of Golden Wine and I thought that you might like it.
This is a very fine and expensive wine. I will savor this gift. Thank you.

options.text: Offer Joel the Dryad's Kiss Wine

nodes.text: I found this wine carefully stored away and I thought that maybe you would enjoy it...
I do not wish to seem ungrateful for such a gift, but I am curious as to why you would give me such a thing?
I think that you are a very special person, much like the wine.
This is a very rare and very valuable vintage to the connoisseur of wines! I am most thankful for this gift. You are most kind, Shawn.
No, thank you. I have little time to spare for reading books.
I picked this rose earlier. It would make a nice addition to the lapel of your jacket.
Why, thank you. I am very fond of the fragrance of roses.

options.text: Give the Beaded Necklace to Joel

nodes.text: Would you like this necklace of beads?
You are giving this to me? It is kind of you to do so.
I came across this magical ring, and I thought that you might like it as a gift...
Is this what I think it is?
Yes! A disappearing! This is something I have always wanted to find.
How did you come across such a thing?
Let's just say that the previous owner wasn't too happy to give it up.
I cannot thank you enough for this gift. You are very generous.
<hugs Shawn>

options.text: Give Joel the "One and Only" Ring

nodes.text: I'd like you to have this...
Am I truly your 'one and only'? It is very sweet of you to say so.

options.text: Tell Joel that He is the One for You

nodes.text: Joel, you are the only one in my heart.
No one has ever been kinder or a more true friend than you, Shawn.
I should very much like to be your one and only.
You are very much a Rogue, Mr. O'Conner. That's why I like you so much.

options.text: Tell Joel that He's a Friend

nodes.text: I think that this could be the start of a beaufiful relationship.
We will make a very fine team working together, you and I.
I thought that you might like this ring I found...
This is a most valuable ring particularly under the right circumstances.
I will make good use of this item, much thanks.
I thought that you might like this ring I found...
Why, this is a very valuable and useful ring! I am surprised that you are giving it to me rather than using it yourself.
But I am most grateful you did give it to me. I thank you for it.
